metadata.synopsis: Halsin expresses concern that Astarion is too controlling in his relationship with the player

2.speaker: Halsin
2.text: To give oneself wholly, and to have a lover totally in your thrall...? A harmless game, until it becomes real. I worry for the two of you, Astarion.

1.speaker: Halsin
1.text: For your sake, I hope some of it is just a fantasy, deep in your heart.

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: Must you take everything so seriously? We're both happy with our arrangement - that's all that matters.
